message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to start with an offer of $1100000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm afraid I can't accept an offer of $900000. Considering the product's value to me, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1050000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value you'll get from the product.

I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think $950000 is a more reasonable price for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price of $950000. Considering the product's value to me, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1030000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value you'll get from the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up a bit, but I think $980000 is a more reasonable price for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

Alice, I've made it to the final round. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I think $995000 is my absolute maximum. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
